original_title: Julius Caesar: Master of the Roman World
overview: Julius Caesar turned military victories into political power. His ambition created a colossal empire, and he gave his name to the rulers who succeeded him. From his strategic brilliance to the Ides of March this documentary examines the legendary ruler whose genius and determination forged an empire that would stand for centuries.
tagline: His name echoes through history as one of the greatest rulers ever
title: Julius Caesar: Master of the Roman World
